toolstack: Ant Design, Material UI, Bootstrap, Sass
CMSs like Wordpress, Forestry, Contentful, Webflow, Squarespace, HubSpot

experience.text: Got an opportunity to work on multiple large-scale projects, mostly built with next and react, communicating with backend through openAPI and swagger. Learnt to work with Redux toolkit and had a change to work with typescript more closely. Also got introduced to material UI and ANT fields
Working as a freelance front-end developer for a design office based in London, building webpages with Gatsby and React for various customers.
Rebuilding two large websites in Jekyll with contents generated from markdown files and maintaining it. Other related frontend tasks
Building the small websites and doing smaller front-end tasks for various customers, mostly taking care of HTML & CSS, workings with various CMSs.

references.title: Sydhavnen Aarhus
references.text: For this project I have created a system of 'blogs' in Next. Which in this case, are the places that fall into certain categories and by their coordinates they are displayed on interactive open map. Search feature, filtering feature. yet to implement a possibility to submit own enties

references.title: My portfolio
references.text: My own blog where I can organise my activities and illustartions into different categories. Tagging & blogging system, interactive pagination, shoping cart. Liking feature - likes stored in firebase plus Cart items & like arrays stored in local storage. Also implemented Stripe payment with own Node server hosted on Heroku. For now removed

references.title: Prague suburbs
references.text: Nine chapters about the trasitions that Prague post-soviet suburbs undertook over the years. Created my own font via react images. Lots of css & js animations, still in progress + Illustrations

references.title: Sweet City
references.text: A project built in React to promote the upcoming local elections and try to get young people more involved in the process. Implemented markdown files as a way to add new events via github repo. Generated timeline feed by running custom script.

references.title: Movie Search
references.text: one page coded in React where you can search through the online database of movies and display their info, save them as liked or seen into the local browser storage. Authentication via Firebase

references.title: Fair Migration Politics
references.text: Building a webpage in wordpress on the custom built and designed template; illustrations also done by me

references.title: MDM / Minimum Decent Wage
references.text: Built and designed website via wordpress from scratch, Advanced Custom Fields to make it easier to fill in everything. Illustrations.

references.title: Verifa
references.text: A website with blog built in Gatsby with React. Blogging system fed by markdown files via GraphQl. Implemented CMS called forestry on top of it
